content.description: The Salomon Shift Pro 130 Alpine Touring Ski Boots are built for the hard charging freerider who plunders the goods both in and out of the resort, but doesnâ€™t want to deal with multiple pairs of boots. Seamless race liners and heat moldable Custom HD shells combine for an incredibly precise and comfortable fit, with a Surelock walk mode delivering smooth action and impressive range of motion for easy skinning. The Core-Frame construction mirrors that of Salomon's dedicated resort boots, meaning there are zero compromises on downhill power and response when things get puckering. Whatever your goals in the backcountry, the Salomon Shift Pro 130 Alpine Touring Ski Boots are sure to get you there and back with a smile on your face.
content.name: Salomon Shift Pro 130 Alpine Touring Ski Boots 2023
